# **Title:** Website Maintenance and Management Service
$tenderClosingDate-appelOffresDateCloture #


| Tenders Awarded       | Tender Evaluation Dates    |
|------------------------|--------------------------------|
| Reference No.          | Procurement S.N               |
| Number of Proposals Accepted          | *province de source of Information*   |

## Tender Details
- Tender Reference No.: cb-544-59526157
- Solicitation No.: CLC-COM-0823
- Notice of Procurement: Request for Proposal (Open Bidding);
- Trade Agreement(s): Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Regions Open to Supply:  Ontario (except National Capital Region NCR)
- Regions for Delivery: Canada
- Language of Service: English and French
- Expected Contract Start Date: January 2, 2024
- Expected Contract End Date: January 2, 2032
- Deadline for Closing Tender: 16:00:00 EST, Friday November 3, 2023

Offers received after the above mentioned closing time are unofficial, may not be accepted, and may result in elimination of the offer.

# **Service Required:**
The successful proposal would involve an agreement for website hosting, maintenance, design and management services with Canada Lands Company.

# **Evaluation Method:**
Selection will be made based on evaluation of the proposal using variations or combinations of the "rating system."

# **Documentation Obtainable:**
Tender documents that may be downloaded at no charge in both English and French from the Government Electronic Tendering Service at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca)

All documents listed may be opened by the Government Electronic Tendering Service at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca)


# **Contact Information:**
R. Brifkani, Contract Manager
Canada Lands Company
1 University Avenue Suite 1700
Toronto, Ontario
M5J2P1
Phone: (416) 214-1297
E-mail: RBrifkani@clc-sic.ca


Kindly, do not hesitate to contact the Contract Manager in case of queries.
